title: Idyllic Adults-Only Greek Island Escape with Daily Dining
description:
Find romance on the sparkling shores of the Mediterranean Sea with an idyllic escape on the Greek island of Zakynthos, staying at the striking Meandros Boutique & Spa. This adults-only haven offers world-class facilities and outstanding hospitality in one of the best locations on the island, right in the heart of the main village of Kalamaki and minutes from the beach - making this the ideal destination to unwind in romantic seclusion and experience the magnetic beauty of the Greek islands’ best-kept secret.

Your relaxing escape includes daily breakfast, nightly dinner, a refreshing mocktail each on arrival and a 15% discount on all spa treatments to achieve ultimate relaxation.

title: Idyllic Adults-Only Five-Star Greek Island Escape with Daily Dining
description:
Find five-star romance on the sparkling shores of the Mediterranean Sea with an idyllic escape on the Greek island of Zakynthos, staying at the striking Meandros Boutique & Spa. This adults-only haven offers world-class facilities and outstanding hospitality in one of the best locations on the island, right in the heart of the main village of Kalamaki and minutes from the beach - making this the ideal destination to unwind in romantic seclusion and experience the magnetic beauty of the Greek islands’ best-kept secret.

Nestled on the island's southern coastline, the hotel is surrounded by lush lawns and manicured gardens and features an elegant restaurant serving up delicious Mediterranean fare, sparkling indoor and outdoor pools and a luxurious spa offering treatments from sauna sessions to aromatherapy.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Begin each day in paradise with a delicious buffet breakfast
- Indulge in nightly buffet dinner with local and international fare
- Celebrate on arrival with a welcome cocktail
- Enjoy 20% off all treatments available at the blissful spa

**Pool Upgrade:** Elevate your stay by upgrading to a blissful Deluxe Suite with Private Pool, complete with a sun-kissed terrace with a private pool and a lounge area. Your suite also boasts a plush queen bed, modern bathroom with bathtub and shower, and luxe amenities.

**Book with 100% Confidence:** If for whatever reason you don’t want to go on your holiday, you can cancel right up to 14 days before check-in and get a 100% credit to use at Luxury Escapes for any other accommodation offer. Excludes flights, see the Fine Print for details.
